divs: sighting detailsim going to try to discribe 2 of 5 events as best i can starting with the most recent one first.on the early morning of may 3 about 1:15 am on the way back from mexia tx. my wife and her sister saw a bell shaped object with 2 big nonblinking lights one red and one green.the lights were on the bottom portion the object making the bell shape visable.they were heading south on hwy 39 about 1\2 mile away from hwy 164.my wife sister is in the military and estamats it was about 150 meters away from them,and about as high in the air as a water tower. the object was in their estamte about 12' across and not sure about hight but was taller than it was wide.they obreved it for a total of about 10 sec and about 3 sec of flight time.when it flew away it left in a high enough rate of speed to leave tracer light trail behide it. the socond event occurred on the night of march 9 2010 the day my second son was born.about 4:00am with 20 min before we could head to the hospital me and my wife on our porch in the west part of the sky witnessed an object fly in mutiple patterns in the sky.we watched it for a total of 20 mins it never left we had to leave so we are not for sure how long it was in the sky.it was flying in zig zags, triangles, hovering for mins at a time traveling 50 to 100 miles north back to south,up,down,shapes in not seconds but less less tan 1.it had no discernable flight pattern nor traveled in any one direction.the object looked at first glance looked like a big star yellow tint no flashing at all.
